name: Andrew Night's at freddy's: game of the year edition
name_original: Andrew Night's at freddy's: game of the year edition
description: okay, okay. OKAY. so basically andrew has this pizza place and it is called penis penis pizza okay. you got that? so in this pizza place we have andrew (because he owns it) and pyncone (aka wethan) and grayson (aka grayson). just play it please five nights at freddies freddy's andrew nights. It's just a FNAF fan game. Find the secrets all of them.
